thread.title: Nice cozy place with a central location
thread.title_full: Nice cozy place with a central location - Review of Duminy Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Franktanks
title: Nice cozy place with a central location
text:
This hotel offers a great value for the money. The rooms are on the smaller side, but they have a nice cozy feeling. The hotel staff is very professional and friendly, and the bar tender at the lobby bar whipped up some creative and tasty cocktails for us.
The best part about this hotel is its location. This place is right in the middle of Vendome, which is very nice part of Paris. It's basically a 2 minutes walk from the tuileries gardens and the Place Vendôme. The Louvre is less than 10 minutes away by foot, and Most of the major landmarks of Paris are within walking distance, including the Eiffel Tower, Champs Élysée, Notre-Dame, Les invalides, etc...
I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a hotel that doesn't break the budget yet still offers excellent service and a great location.
